amendment.description: Amendment extends the proof of loss filing deadline to 180 days; prohibits the denying of claims solely for failure to meet the deadline; and makes the change retroactive to September 18, 2003.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 109-530 to extend the proof of loss filing deadline to 180 days and would prohibit NFIP from denying claims solely for failing to meet the deadline and make this change retroactive to September 18, 2003.
